website_summaries.verdict: Portable generator that’s easy to move around for power-tool or leisure use, and is also remarkably quiet.
pros: Compact yet powerful, with excellent fuel efficiency
Quiet operation makes it a great pick for campsites
Can be paralleled to increase supply
cons: Honda recalled, and appear to have resolved the problem

website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight model will run basic appliances while you're camping – good gas performance.
pros: when empty, making it easy to move
Great performance level as it will run for about 8 hrs
of gasoline, meaning you won't have to carry a lot of gas in the RV
cons: Only offers 2,200W, which ranks below many other models in this category

customer_reviews.title: Get two small funnels-Wish it were quieter
customer_reviews.text: I've used the generator a couple of times so far. Everything is working well. I thought it would be somewhat quieter. But the noise level is indeed lower than for non-quiet models. I wish the owner's manual had stated that one needs a funnel to pour engine oil (otherwise you're almost sure to make a mess) and shown in a drawing the proper level for the engine oil. This I found out in one of the explanatory videos. I also wish it had recommended the use of a funnel for pouring gas as well. Even with a gasoline container that is equipped with a spout, you will most likely need a funnel to avoid making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: JMPP

customer_reviews.title: Two Recalls Already
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it for 5 hrs total and I am having to take it back for the second Recall Notice Repair. Honda Quality... YEAH, RIGHT!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: $1200 generator failed after 30 min. CPO Outlets blew me off, very rude and uncaring. Amazon no help at all. Now appealing to Honda for help. Disgusted
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: Noise level the lowest at the market
customer_reviews.text: I make a huge research for a inverter generator and the Honda was the best according to the consumer research, the price found at Amazon was amazing. I love the weight and easy to turn it off, the noisy level is the lower at the market . When you talk about Honda products they are the top on quality
customer_reviews.author: Pito

customer_reviews.title: Complete Fail
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to how this item performs as it was damaged. The rear vent screen was broken (see pic). Please beware when making a $1,000.00 plus purchase especially when the product is shipped damaged and weighs over 40lbs. It cost me $145.00 out of my pocket to ship this damaged generator back.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter Rider

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you can return before ordering if there is a problem
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this generator, but after receiving, found out it not big enough for my project. It was never unpackaged. I wanted to return to, but the seller want cover return charges ($112.00).
customer_reviews.author: gary fowler

customer_reviews.title: Must get propane adapter
customer_reviews.text: Ran my whole house fridge lights toaster oven when I needed it tv internet everything on 2.7 gal in 24 hrs. Don’t forget you can hookup propane or natural gas with an adapter. I was amazed how the exhaust from propane was scentless. The propane allows you to have a one time hookup that lasts more than 2 days so you don’t have to deal with refilling small gas tank no mess and no residue build up and engine lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even start
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this eu2200, and received yesterday, put oil and gas in, and the generator wouldn't start, I pulled the starter cord 100+ times for a while between breaks, I'm in my way to send it back, be careful if you plan to spend over 1k in a product that doesn't work, can't believe my champion generator works better after 5 years of being used than this Honda yet being brand new, I can't give you a helpful review, because all this thing did was not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful machine, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad I spent the extra money to get the best. It has worked perfectly so far. Starts easily, runs quiet. Also, I got a very nice surprise when running on ECO mode. The Honda EU220i is advertised to run 8.1 hours when utilizing the ECO throttle but it actually runs for about 10 hours. This is very helpful to me since I bought it, primarily, to run my CPAP machine when camping. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. wyk

customer_reviews.title: 1000$ for a cracked device!!!
customer_reviews.text: The box was looking like somebody played soccer with it and i found the generator with this cracks on it when i took it from the box
customer_reviews.author: Marcel Popa

customer_reviews.title: Honda over generac.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quiet generator. This is the second one i ve owned and will stick with honda from now on. Tries the generac iq in between. Just no comparison. Generac done good for just over a year. If your not going to use it much. Go cheap. But if you want reliability,get the honda.
customer_reviews.author: L Smith

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 20 year old Honda Gen
customer_reviews.text: My first Honda generator was my very first on-line purchase 20 years ago. I wanted the newer 2200 Model so I gave my still running perfect 2000 to my great nephew. I expect 20 or more years out of this one. Shipped quick and arrived 2 days early in perfect condition. I dumped a few tablespoons of residual oil out of it and filled it with fresh oil and fuel and it started on the third rope pull. If I have any problems I'll update but I doubt it...can't beat a Honda!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This is Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was just the ticket to parellel our eu20000. The numbers corresponded well that we found to parellel a eu2000i to the new eu2200i generator. We hooked everything up and we had air, lights and even our small microwave all worked. We cooled down our travel trailer and we’re so happy that we will be cool this summer 😎 thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Huseman

customer_reviews.title: Runs and 11000 BTU Air Conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, runs my 11000 BTU AC on my RV. Start the AC with the generator on the Normal Mode then switch it to Eco mode. It will then idle down and run at a fairly low RPM. When restarting the AC wait 5 minutes until the compressor has bled off and the start capacitor is recharged. I am thrilled not to have to haul around a 70 lb generator to power the AC. I doubt it will start a 13500 BTU unit though as it does struggle a bit with the start-up on the 11000.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad K.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t have asked for anything better!
customer_reviews.text: Having limited experience with generators I can say that this Honda unit is easy to use, starts immediately, and hums softly while in the eco-mode. We use this for our cabin. In the whiter eco-mode we ran two fans, a television and dvd set-up, charging two phones, and operating three lights. For our needs it has been PERFECT! Again, limited experience with this type of stuff but was NOT eager to buy a cheaper unit. For any “fence-sitters” I recommend you spend the extra and just buy the Honda. With the special payment plan we were able to stretch out the cost over a year with no interest with the Amazon card. Great item! Great purchase experience!
customer_reviews.author: MajikMan#7

customer_reviews.title: Best price anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best deal for the generator anywhere. We already had a 2000i for years and knew they were the best. We had decided to buy another one and went with the 2200i. Priced everywhere, but got the BEST BUY right here with free shipping and all! We purchased before we had to pay taxes. As far as the generator review itself, we power our cabin with it. It has powered the build of the cabin and used it daily. We kept it serviced properly, and it still runs. We have owned the old one for 9 years. We trust and expect the same quality from this new one too😄
customer_reviews.author: Sandra K

customer_reviews.title: Quietest Generator Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quietness, wish we would have had it in the Army. Starts great about the 3rd pull. Even under a full load it's quiet enough to hear yourself talk over it! Can't go wrong, well worth the money. I'm paralleling 2 to make it 4000 watts. Easy to do and both are still quiet!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Ready for hurricane season
customer_reviews.text: Ready for hurricane season. This is our second one and they run our small house like the power company would. Also we can help our neighbors with their refrigerators.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome generator
customer_reviews.text: I was debating on paying the premium price over competitive models for over a month but decided to finally just do it. I am 100% satisfied with this generator and none of the cheaper models compare this is in a class of its own. What else can you say that everyone hasn't already said, its the best. Spend the extra money and you will have it a lifetime, its that good.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: I mean, what can be said, it’s a Honda
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is? Expensive little bad a$$ generator. You get what you pay for with this guy. It’s gonna work hard, be quiet and make electricity for you. I like some of the improvements like the fuel shut off, fuel drain and Bluetooth (which includes hour meter). I got the companion as well with the Berg extended run fuel system. Improvements come at a minimum price hike from previous year. Curious if the CO monitor will give me trouble down the line. Living on the gulf coast I got this for hurricane outages because it sips gas and gives great power! Will run two friges, lights and fans.
customer_reviews.author: Non-Tech Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for power outages in USVI
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that you will need to put oil in the engine before you start it. It’s a bit hard to tell how much gas ⛽️ has been filled, so this was a guessing game. Engine is fairly quiet & operates smoothly without power surges. Overall, I’m happy with this purchase. Seller shipped extremely fast! Excellent & I would not hesitate to order from this business again.
customer_reviews.author: St Thomas Esty

customer_reviews.title: Very portable..
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use with all the power I need. In addition to being quiet it is easy to use .. I can power lamps, coffee maker and a small microwave oven.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Owen Young

customer_reviews.title: Good, but wont run my RV a/c
customer_reviews.text: According to my owners manual my motor home basement a/c unit is 12,500 btu. I was hoping this 2,200 would be enough to run it, but, alas, it isn't quiet enough. The unit will run less than a minute and then shut down. None the less, I will find many uses for this little guy. Buy the way, it isn't "super quiet" at all.
customer_reviews.author: BeGreatful

customer_reviews.title: One of the best choices you can make buying this unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great product all the way around. Rated one of the best and if you do searches you'll know why. Quite is one nice feature with this unit. After adding oil and gas and from a cold start. It took 21 pulls. Normal for it. Watched countless videos and they were spot on. Easy start to. After letting sit a while I went back and 1 pull. It was running. One of the best rated engine Honda uses on it. Best and happiest choice I made buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer in westland, Mi

customer_reviews.title: Great generator
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product one time and it performed perfectly. Used it for three days to run two refrigerator's and a two freezers, plus two fans and two lights. Only ran for 3 1/2 hours, but only used one gallon of fuel. Did a great job. Pretty sure if I had used it on half load I would have gotten atleast 6 hours. Used phone's for entertainment. Kept them charged as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McCullen

customer_reviews.title: Converted it to tri-fuel
customer_reviews.text: It works great on gasoline. I needed it only for the blackouts due to wildfires. I didn't use it often and the gasoline went stale. I had a natural gas line to the back yard for the barbecue pit. It was an easy conversion from gasoline to include propane and natural gas. Now I have the best of all worlds. I has the quiet and dependability of Honda, I can store propane forever, just in case they turn off the gas. I can run it for hours on natural gas and not worry about running out of fuel.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: A little more piece of mind in the winter.
customer_reviews.text: Let you know this winter if the power is out and I'm freezing. @2200 peak watts, comfortably will maintain a whole room with heater,tv,internet, chargers, or maybe a small coffee pot or microwave. Of course not all operating at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: keith

customer_reviews.title: There is a recall...
customer_reviews.text: There is/was a recall... I had to take it to local Honda authorized repair center, hard to start & no electricity... they replaced part/all of the case.. Now starts easily, everything good. Seller offered return only.. So far, I’m glad I opted to have no cost repair, not return. If not for this problem it would have been a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: tacoma

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Emergency Power
customer_reviews.text: This Honda EU2200i replaces a Westinghouse WH2200iXLT which proved to be unreliable. The problem with the Westinghouse was a float valve/seat but unfortunately those tiny parts are not available and I had to purchase a new carburetor ($28). The Honda is well-made and, while it costs more it should be much more reliable. I've run it for a couple house and so far, so good. The Westinghouse is now repaired and my backup to the Honda.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Purrs like a kitten while sipping gas after a one pull start!
customer_reviews.text: In an emergency, do you ant to rely on a sketchy brand that may or may not start while a big storm or hurricane is bearing down on you! NO! Hinda gives you great features but at end of day, it will stretch out your gas rations when everthing is closed. Will start on one pull. Running generator will not drive you crazy with excessive running noise. Plug in your small fridge, small air conditioner a few fans, your radio then hunker down with your sweetie and family and ride out that storm in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a generator for years. Over the last few years, I had heard many good comments about these. Because of a main electrical panel replacement project at my house, I knew I would have a several day power outage. That was the excuse to buy this. Worked great for the 80 hour outage, and several uses since. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jim W.

customer_reviews.title: Honda quality
customer_reviews.text: I looked at several 2K generators before I settled on the Honda. I have talked to people who are happy with their Harbor Freight models, or Westinghouse, etc. ,but I wanted to be as close to certain that this thing would crank and run when I needed it. So far, it has, and I love it. It is very quiet in the eco-mode, you can stand right beside in and have a normal conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Karl H

customer_reviews.title: Easy to transport, and very quiet. Does more than rated.
customer_reviews.text: Don't trust videos on it. I tried to make one, and it sounds like a lawn mower. Ugh. It is less than half as loud as one. The thing purrs. Under full load it sounds like a lawnmower with a silencer. Great power delivery, and I trust plugging my sensitive electronics into it. Joy to camp with!
customer_reviews.author: Pete Inchausti

customer_reviews.title: Not much else to add, other than, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I knew there were cheaper versions out there, but I stand with the golden rule “you get what you pay for”. This is a great little unit. Bought because of a pending Hurricane which was a non event for us. However, I feel great knowing that I have this. Make sure you read the user manual. It’s an easy read and will help keep the unit running well. You can’t go wrong with this great generator. Hey, it’s a Honda.
customer_reviews.author: KSS133

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra cost!
customer_reviews.text: More expensive than other brands yet the reliability of the Honda engine makes it worth it to me. I've tried other engines to save money but found the ease of starting the Honda engine highly reliable and easier to use. Maybe if you used another brand and started it very frequently you would have better luck than I have found. Now everything I buy must have a Honda engine if its available.
customer_reviews.author: SAIL SRQ

customer_reviews.title: Runs great. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hurricane preparation. It was easy to set up and get running. It is compact and very well built. The generator doesn't come with oil, so make sure you get the right oil before you set it up. It's good to have a long funnel and paper towels to clean up any oil drips when adding the oil.
customer_reviews.author: R. McMullin

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected, a bit pricey and lacking featurs other lower cost brands have. But I went for the very low noise and quality Honda is known for.
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Nice generator
customer_reviews.text: I know there are cheaper gens at harbor freight, but this is a Honda. Quiet, light weight and if maintained should be trouble free for many years. It was purchased for it’s reliability because when you need a generator you don’t want to have to troubleshoot it, you need it to run. I paid extra for a Honda lawnmower years ago and have not regretted my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapper142

customer_reviews.title: Built Honda tough!
customer_reviews.text: It's a Honda so you know the noise level was perfect. I purchased this based on my experience with a similar Honda that my brother loaned me when my power went out. It powered my AC, refrigerator, lamp and tv. One of the best portable generators around. Also, it was delivered two days early! Kudos to the seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not the generator for you or anyone.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is garbage. I own ten motorcycles and have kickstarted 40 year-old engines in less than 5 kicks after a complete rebuild. This thing on the other hand has yet to start after 50+ pulls. Doesn't even sound like it's going to turn over. I'm guessing that after spending $1200 I'll have to spend even more to get rid of it. I knew I should have gone with Yamaha. I don't need my race bike to start in an emergency. I need a generator to start. Guess which one starts right now.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Z Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Used our new unit for Hurricane Florence backup ang thereafter daily on our farm for multiple needs. Without a doubt this is a “must have” item for every household and business. Performs exactly as expected! Because of our experience, via Amazon, we have the pleasure of meeting FEDEX today and collecting our second Unit. Need I say more! Well yes, this is the real deal, stay away from all the junk available at half price.
customer_reviews.author: ENZOD

customer_reviews.title: This generator is expensive for the wattage it puts out but it is so quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: If this generator has enough wattage for your needs this is a great generator. It cost a lot for the amount of wattage it puts out but I love how quiet it runs and it is very efficient. It has two settings for the output and if you aren't using a lot of power it has a low setting that makes even less noise and it more efficient. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald E. Hume

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and powerful, great service.
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet and lightweight (about 45lbs). Easy to set up and started on 1st pull. Does not include oil (10w30 recommended). Electricity went out and we were able to power our refrigerator, tv, phone/chargers and a box fan. Got about 8 hours on 1 gallon. Delivery came in time for us to save our frozen items.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with a Honda pedigree
customer_reviews.text: It's Honda quality, apparent on first handling. It's unexpectedly quiet, easy to use and light enough to carry around if necessary. Even though we use it for emergency power outages (refrigerator especially) if I decide to get one for the whole house I would consider a bigger Honda. You get what you pay for usually and why not get the best you can afford? You seldom regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Stainless

customer_reviews.title: This Generator Works!
customer_reviews.text: Hurricane Michael hit the Florida Panhandle hard. The Honda EU-2200i was delivered to my home five days after the hurricane left us without power (no air, no lights, no refrigerator, no water pump). The generator was perfect for providing electricity to our small travel trailer, where we could run the air conditioner, the lights, the water pump and the TV. This generator works and it does it's job at a low noise level.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Generator Period!
customer_reviews.text: This generator is no joke. Right out of the box, filled oil, added gas and it fired on 3rd pull. Every other time starts on 1 pull. Runs super quiet, put in front of my truck and cannot hear it in coach. Powers everything but my ac. Icing a second one. Worth every penny I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Its a Honda... you know what that means
customer_reviews.text: Is there anything better than these little Hondas? They are known for reliable, efficient generators and have used them for decades. This one is just for a small jobsite use for 2 guys and has no problem running the battery chargers while running the 12 inch miter saw using about 1 gallon a day. Great little guy here.
customer_reviews.author: Shane S

customer_reviews.title: This Honda is very Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I needed this generator for boondocking in my Airstream and this does the job. Will run my 13500 A/C at 15-16amps.
customer_reviews.author: FrankenFodder

customer_reviews.title: very quiet. Produces enough power to feed into my ...
customer_reviews.text: very quiet. Produces enough power to feed into my 40' sailboat to charge batteries and run lighting without tripping circuit breaker(a problem I had using marina power while the boat is on stands). All that while running on eco mode! Not inexpensive but very reliable (starts on 1st pull almost every time) and runs for hours on a tank of gas.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marteney

customer_reviews.title: Honda EU2200i 2200-Watt 120-Volt Super Quiet Portable Inverter Generator
customer_reviews.text: Supplier was prompt on delivery. The inverter well packaged arrived damage free. Ample instructions included about adding oil and setup for first running. Inverter is very quiet, and generally starts with a single, medium strength pull. Unit runs just about all day on a single fueling. Well pleased with the unit, it's quietness, and its ability to perform flawlessly all day long.
customer_reviews.author: BillKnox

customer_reviews.title: Honda makes the best generators!
customer_reviews.text: This generator is small in size but not in performance. I live in Texas near the coast and we have had three storms in a row these past few months. Our Honda really was life saver when the electricity went out. It runs quietly and using very little gas to run it for long periods of time. I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Dolor

customer_reviews.title: can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift to ourselves to use for dry camping in our new trailer this summer. Can't wait to use it. Studying the correct way to prime it and care for it to be sure we get maximum use - but how can you go wrong with a Honda?! Got to use a friend's and we were immediately sold on this as what we had to have to carry with us.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great little generator
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these from Jacks Small Engines. Excellent customer service by them. They arrived quickly and when I had a question the seller was extremely responsive. These Honda generators of course are top notch. I have them fired up right now as we lost power due to hurricane Sally. My neighbors are probably fretting, but my family is doing great. The food in our two refrigerators will be saved. We're staying cool with the small emergency window A/C unit running. And we can still stream shows as a family tonight. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane Guerette

customer_reviews.title: Power when you need it
customer_reviews.text: So much easier to handle compared to larger generators and quiet too
customer_reviews.author: Dixie Contini

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Best generator I have owned. Did a lot of research before I bought. I am fairly cheap and is the best one I feel you can buy for theoney.
customer_reviews.author: Rick G.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased pleased with purchase Honda generator. We recently acquired a huge freezer and do not want risk losing contents due to power outage. Easy start, easy storage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product, Absolutely the Best, I'm so Pleased.  (yes, pricey too) But I Love It!!
customer_reviews.text: Once in a great while something comes along that just blows your socks off!!! This is one of those things! I'm almost speechless!! I love it so much that my wife thinks I'm nuts. It is HUGELY pricey for sure ... but just fantastic in every way, so quiet, easy to lug around (for 46 pounds). Go to YouTube and watch the videos, it's just amazing, amazing, amazing. As far as I know, this is the very best generator on the market. Go ahead and treat yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Wilder

customer_reviews.title: 2 recalls. Light weight and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and light. Buyer beware. There’s been two recalls so far. One warned that it could catch on fire while running. Amazon doesn’t provide the recall notifications to customers and that’s very scary. The only reason I know is because a relative bought the same generator through a Honda dealer so he gets the recall notices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not needing solar panels when going camping
customer_reviews.text: I truly love my Honda eu2200i generator. The main reason I bought a Honda generator is to recharge my Goal Zero Yeti 1400 battery pack that’s advertised as a generator. The run time on my Honda is great and much better then using Solor panels which can take days to recharge something. Honda generators are the perfect equipment for recharging batteries with inverters in them not solar panels
customer_reviews.author: gerald mccrae

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: This generator is one of the finest pieces of machinery I've ever purchased! So quiet, smooth, and powerful not to mention easy to start. I don't know why I didn't buy it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Louis R. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Everyone know this is a top of the line generator...
customer_reviews.text: but seriously Honda, for $1000 you couldn't have included a pint of oil? Unit uses 10-30 oil, have some on hand because apparently Honda can't afford to include it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime T,

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit!!️!!️
customer_reviews.text: This is a back up..... a friend bought the EU2000 several years ago and paid $200 more. This is a newer model and was reasonably priced. I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joebeimon

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: contacted seller and returned generator they were very nice credited my method of payment the box was so damaged it was actually open and kicked in and filthy returned
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Right before the hurricane
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad we bought this generator. It came in handy as we had hurricane Sally 3 weeks later. This generator is so quiet, I wish all my neighbors had one instead of what they bought. The Honda unit has an economy mode that allowed us to run it all night without having to add fuel which was really nice and it provided all the power we needed for 2 refrigerators and freezer, fan and lights.
customer_reviews.author: TNbeacher

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for a response
customer_reviews.text: Not at all happy. This generator will not start. I’ve checked everything 10 times. Gas, oil, switch on, vent on Gas cap on, choked. Wth ?
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Branch

customer_reviews.title: Honda worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the generic version first, should have saved the time and bought the Honda to begin with! Costs more, but just plain works when you need it.
customer_reviews.author: G Clowers

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Just like everyone says. Quiet, efficient, powerfull, Ran for days at a time with gas tanks hooked in parallel. Ran fridge, freezer, (newer energy efficient model from Best Buy), internet network, and entertainment center using Direct TV all at the same time!
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: it will not start
customer_reviews.text: have to pay >$100 to return it!! spend hours , double checked step by step on all instructions about oi and gas cannot start it. suspect this was a returned item.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer User

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Honda makes a great product and it’s easy to use and this generator is not as loud as a Yamaha. Does everything we need for our RV.
customer_reviews.author: roger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Supreme Surprise
customer_reviews.text: The box is in perfect shape.... Great product but I would like to give Honda a 5 star re-pack review. 1200 dollars for a re-pack. Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Long overdue improvements like ability to run engine until fuel in gas line is depleted.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Trager

customer_reviews.title: Best portable generator
customer_reviews.text: Again Honda exceed my expectation. Best inverter generator for 2000 - 2500 wattage. Very quite operation, portability, efficient and reliable generator. Only gripe is, it take me 10 attempts to initially start the generator. But after that one pull engine starts without a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Gio1983

customer_reviews.title: Super Quiet, fuel efficient
customer_reviews.text: I have only had to use it once so far here in Norther California. 8+ hours continuous use powering two fridges and a couple of lights. Now I am looking to install a "transfer switch" hooked to main panel.
customer_reviews.author: mmss

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: He painted it ugly grey to disguise it because he's so afraid someone might steal it when they see that red cover. We wanted something reliable in case we have a hurricane and lose power.

customer_reviews.title: Super quiet and started right up.
customer_reviews.text: Added some oil to the engine and she started right up....super quiet and compact and not too heavy.

customer_reviews.title: Great generator.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a Honda what more can I say. Starts easy. Runs forever. And is pretty quiet.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and efficient
customer_reviews.text: We chose this Generator and have not disappointed. This is the 3rd one we have ordered it is indeed quiet and with proper maintenance has outlast all the others. These generators are perfect in harsh weather conditions.

customer_reviews.title: Portable Generator
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived before it's scheduled date. That was nice. So far all is good with this generator. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Had this for sometime and it's was a good purchase. We enjoy dry camping at times, so this makes that possible.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Carroll

customer_reviews.title: The best small generator made.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a few cheap generators. Basically, you get what you pay for. The Honda EU2200 works like a fine timepiece. It puts out really clean power and has a reputation of super reliable. Time will tell.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing else in the market comes close to the quiet efficient delivery of power by the Honda EU 2200
customer_reviews.text: Use for Recreational and occasional field use for construction this is the perfect portable power source. Quiet enough to have a conversation without raising your voice while running in eco-mode.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Klein

customer_reviews.title: this thing is great
customer_reviews.text: its light easy to use and easy to start would buy again
customer_reviews.author: dahendry

customer_reviews.title: Really a nice product
customer_reviews.text: It is a quiet generator... didn't bother anyone while we slept.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it and I can use it attached via parralel cabels to my EU2000i!
customer_reviews.text: Love the EU2200i. I also have the EU2000i and the improvements (with no price increase) are all significant. More power, mine seems more quiet, and no increase in weight. The best part is that I can connect the EU2200i to my older EU2000i. There seems to be some confuision over whether this is possible so I'll quote from the EU2200i manual on page 35 on the section titled "Parallel operation with EU2000i", it says: "An EU2200i may be connect to EU2000i or EU2000i Companion generators with serials numbers EAAJ-2017305 or later or EACT-1000001 or later.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfgang Stiller

customer_reviews.title: Super Generator
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, the only thing that's of a bit concern is on the eco mode the generator vibrates (wobbles} a lot. hope that doesn't cause parts to loosen or ware.
customer_reviews.author: Rak

customer_reviews.title: This is what you need
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this New model Honda EU2200I generator, it had no reviews. I would never purchase anything without reviews, nor would I recommend ANYONE to do so. However, I decided to look at who the seller was. With 4,000 sales and extreamly satisfied customers I decided to take a chance. Turns out the deal was perfect. I received a brand new 2,200 watt Honda generator. Remember to purchase your oil as well, because it won’t come with the generator. Obviously it wont, because it’s a brand new engine.

customer_reviews.title: Great quiet small generator
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little generator. It's great for use in our motorhome. We appreciate the switch that allows to run the gas out of the motor. It is also nice the way the gas tank can be drained.

customer_reviews.text: Best generator made. Starts early and runs quietly. Easily handles two refrigerators and one freezer plus

product_meta.title: Honda EU2200i 2200-Watt 120-Volt Super Quiet Portable Inverter Generator
product_meta.description: Honda Power Equipment sets a new standard in portable power with the introduction of an all new EU2200i inverter generator. Part of Honda Power Equipment's Super Quiet Series of generators, the new EU2200i lineup is the perfect portable generator for work, home or play. The all-new Honda EU2200i inverter generator offers tremendous value to users, delivering 10 percent more power (200 watts) than the outgoing EU2000i model, the company's most popular portable model for the same price. The heart of the additional power the new generator delivers is the Honda GXR120 engine. With more power, better performance and improved ease of use and maintenance, the all-new Honda EU2200i is the perfect choice for consumers to power what they need for work, home or play. In addition to more wattage, the all-new EU2200i delivers consumers additional user-friendly features including a fuel shut off valve that allows the engine to run with the fuel supply off, helping prevent issues related to stale fuel; a large spout and oil drain gutter for cleaner, easier oil changes; a smooth, light effort recoil; a user-friendly design that incorporates color-coded startup points to start the generator; and increased ventilation that improves airflow resulting in better cooling of key components. Signature required for delivery
feature_bullets: This popular model can operate a wide variety of appliances, making it perfect for portable use at home, camping, on the job site, or much more. Reliable Power is now at your fingertips with Honda's Inverted Generators.

So quiet, your neighbors will thank you. The EU2200i operates at 48 to 57 dBA, which is less noise than a normal conversation. This makes it ideal for camping, supplemental RV power and any other activity that requires quiet operation.
Add a second EU2200i for additional power. Two identical models can be paralleled with an optional cable or cord for up to 4400 watts of power, or time-consuming applications.

Thanks to our exclusive Eco-Throttle System, the EU2200i offers great fuel efficiency. Runs 4.0 to 9.6 hours on a single tank, depending on the load. This makes it the ideal choice for overnight power, or long-time applications.

Honda's inverter technology means stable, clean power in a smaller, lighter package. The precision of Honda's inverter technology ensures our inverter generators produce power that is as reliable as the power you get from your outlets at home.
